Html: Powershell script is not running under custom update, please share if any extra parameters needed to add

Please start WPP, select the update and click on the "Id" link. This will open an Explorer window, open the folder and get the guid.xml file.

On a client where you have run the custom update, go to "C:\Windows\Temp" and get the CustomUpdateEngine.xml file.
Send me these two files at package.publisher@free.fr

Apologies for the delay in response.


CustomUpdateEngine
